{{Infobox Berry |name = #67 Enigma |image = [[File:Enigma.png]] |caption = A completely enigmatic Berry. It apparently has the power of the stars that fill the night sky. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*40 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Enigma''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by linking your game to the Discord, obtaining 4 different hints from the Kanto [[Berry Master]] and surrounding an empty plot with berries according to those hints. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 7 days |- ! Animation |
